thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Retreat as Equities Rally
thread.title_full: U.S. Government Bonds Retreat as Equities Rally - WSJ

author: Cynthia Lin
title: U.S. Government Bonds Retreat as Equities Rally
text:
Prices on U.S. Treasurys declined Wednesday as policy makers soothed fears about a slowdown in the Chinese economy, and the U.S. government prepared to sell 10-year debt.
In early New York trading, benchmark 10-year notes lost 16/32 in price to yield 2.25%, according to Tradeweb. Thatâ€™s the highest yield in a month. Two-year notes pulled back 1/32 to yield 0.761%, near the highest rate this year. Bond yields rise when prices fall.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
